snippet: Outrage erupted on social media after a female politician suggested that a room be set aside so that the record number of women in Parliament could freshen up.
abstract: Ridicule and outrage erupts within Israel's Parliament and on social media after female politician suggests that room be set aside so that the record number of women lawmakers can freshen up.

byline.original: By JODI RUDOREN and IRIT PAZNER GARSHOWITZ

lead_paragraph: Outrage erupted on social media after a female politician suggested that a room be set aside so that the record number of women in Parliament could freshen up.

headline.main: Powder Room in Parliament? Israelis Scoff
headline.print_headline: Powder Room In Parliament? Israelis Scoff
